basics.name: Haoming Chen
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate student in Computer Science and Technology at Sichuan University, focusing on multi-agent reinforcement learning, risk-sensitive reinforcement learning, multi-robot collaboration, and autonomous vehicle mapping, localization, and navigation.

projects.name: Full-Stack Development of Lightweight Autonomous Golf Cart - First in Southwest China Universities
projects.summary: Core member of joint project between Sichuan University and National University of Singapore, led by Prof. Hongliang Guo, Prof. Marcelo Ang Jr., Prof. Jiancheng Lv, and Prof. Yingjie Zhou.
highlights: Hardware System Integration: Completed wire control modification, electrification transformation, and multi-source sensor integration based on ordinary golf cart, building a reliable engineered vehicle platform.
Software Architecture Development: Utilized multi-source fusion localization and prediction algorithms to handle complex campus environments.
Real Vehicle Deployment and Testing: Completed open road testing at Sichuan University Jiangan Campus, achieving autonomous cruising, turning, and dynamic obstacle avoidance functions.

projects.name: Smart Search - Reliable Parking Space Search System Based on Mean-Standard Deviation Proximal Policy Optimization
projects.summary: Project leader under the guidance of Prof. Hongliang Guo at Sichuan University Machine Learning and Industrial Intelligence Application Engineering Research Center of Ministry of Education.
highlights: Theoretical and Algorithmic Innovation: Proposed MS-PPO algorithm addressing the pain point of traditional algorithms ignoring search uncertainty, derived second-order Bellman equation and dual-objective policy gradient theorem, solving the mathematical challenge of non-linear additivity of standard deviation.

Policy Optimization Implementation: Designed modular architecture including MS-TD and MS-PG, introduced generalized advantage estimation to balance dual optimization of mean and variance, achieving 'stable yet fast' search strategy in various complex topological road networks.
Full-Stack System Deployment: Independently built autonomous driving experimental platform based on golf cart, realized full-process autonomous planning and parking in real underground garage.

patents.name: Reinforcement Learning-Based Reliable Parking Space Search Method and System
patents.summary: Invention patent for intelligent parking space search system using reinforcement learning.
